Type Method# moveEquipment(_:childOf:order:pose:context:)

visionOS 2.0+

```
static func moveEquipment(
    _ equipment: some Equipment,
    childOf parent: any Equipment,
    order: MoveEquipmentAction.Order? = nil,
    pose: TableVisualState.Pose2D? = nil,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` is `MoveEquipmentAction`.## [See Also](/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopAction/moveEquipment(_:childOf:order:pose:context:)#see-also)
